Publication Title: A new function for nuclear lamins: providing surface tension to the nuclear drop
Publication Authors: Richard B Dickinson, Tanmay P Lele
Publication Abstract: The nuclear lamina, a conserved structure in metazoans, provides mechanical rigidity to the nuclear envelope. A decrease in lamin levels and/or lamin mutations are associated with a host of human diseases.
